doc: Checkbox represents a user interface element which spans a visible area to click or tap from the user. Use it for controls, which do not cause an immediate effect. See also [Toggle].

1.doc: InputValue is where updated value of the checked states are written.
1.name: InputValue

5.doc: Id represents an optional identifier to locate this component within the view tree. It must be either empty or unique within the entire tree instance.
5.name: Id
